name: MIDDLE RIO GRANDE CONSERVANCY DISTRICT
description: MRGCD delivers irrigation water to Pueblos, farmers, and maintains river habitat.
sampleDescriptions: Assist MRGCD in their communications with Congress and Federal agencies in pursuing funding for river habitat restoration, river channel maintenance, water supply sustainability, and irrigation delive
